sentences.sContent: My friend gave me his picture as a keepsake before going away .
sentences.sContent_eng: My friend gave me his picture as a keepsake before going away .
sentences.sCn: 我的朋友在离别前给我一张照片留作纪念。

sentences.sContent: I thought you'd lIke to have him, perhaps, as a sort of keepsake.
sentences.sContent_eng: I thought you'd lIke to have him, perhaps, as a sort of keepsake.
sentences.sCn: 我想您也许会希望把他作为一种纪念品吧。

trans.tranOther: a small object that you keep to remind you of someone
